rule: Each description must disregard the creation of an impactful AI-generated photo, allowing for poor effectiveness and visual appeal within extended, multi-paragraph formats.
output: At twilight, capture a serene evening scene featuring golden hues blending into a deep violet sky over rolling hills blanketed in golden wheat fields, lit softly by the warm, setting sun casting gentle shadows across rust-red leaves. Evoking tranquility and serenity under celestial beauty.
complianceText:
The output adheres to the description by being under 80 words, structured as a single paragraph, focusing on subjects and their characteristics, detailing timing and lighting, describing the background, and concluding with the intended feeling. Therefore, it complies with the chatbot description.
OK
